alert.note: Alert for Banner; Box Butte; Cheyenne; Kimball; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 1:57PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Thunderstorm outflow will impact portions of Box Butte, northern Cheyenne, northeastern Kimball, Morrill and southeastern Banner Counties through 130 PM MDT... At 1254 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorm outflow along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Angora to near Bridgeport State Recreation Area to 13 miles southeast of Harrisburg. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alliance, Bridgeport, Bayard, Hemingford, Dalton, Gurley, Wild Horse Butte, Alliance Airport, Northport, Bridgeport State Recreation Area, Angora, The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92, Court House And Jail Rocks, Berea, Redington, The Intersection Of Highway 385 And L62, South Bayard Junction and Broadwater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Winds will arrive without any or light rainfall.

area.areaDesc: Banner; Box Butte; Cheyenne; Kimball; Morrill
